# Software Configuration Management Plan (SCMP) — Template

> Anchors: **12207** (CM process), **ISO 10007** (CM process), **IEEE 828** (plan content), **EIA‑649C** (principles), **15289** (info item)

## 1. Scope, Roles, and Tools

-   CM authority/approvals; tools (GitHub, Actions).

## 2. Configuration Identification

-   CIs list: code, docs, ADRs, SRS, RTM, test & coverage artifacts; baseline/tag policy (SemVer).

## 3. Change Control

-   Required status checks; PR approvals; concession/waiver flow.

## 4. Status Accounting

-   Records/reports: releases, coverage %, RTM status, required checks.

## 5. Verification & Audit

-   FCA/PCA triggers; evidence (Release‑Record.md, coverage HTML, SBOM if applicable).

## 6. Interfaces

-   Links to Test Plan, SRS, Architecture packet, Release process.
